Your comprehensive guide to apartment living in the Mile High City

Explore Neighborhoods Renter Resources

Popular Denver Neighborhoods

Downtown

Urban living in the heart of Denver with easy access to dining, entertainment, and transit.

Avg. Rent: $1,950 Walk Score: 92
Explore Downtown

Capitol Hill

Historic neighborhood with diverse housing options, vibrant nightlife, and cultural attractions.

Avg. Rent: $1,650 Walk Score: 89
Explore Capitol Hill

LoDo

Trendy Lower Downtown district with converted lofts, upscale dining, and proximity to Union Station.

Avg. Rent: $2,100 Walk Score: 94
Explore LoDo

Highland

Charming neighborhood with Victorian homes, boutique shopping, and acclaimed restaurants.

Avg. Rent: $1,850 Walk Score: 85
Explore Highland

Cherry Creek

Upscale area featuring luxury apartments, high-end shopping, and beautiful parks.

Avg. Rent: $2,300 Walk Score: 88
Explore Cherry Creek

RiNo

Creative district with industrial-chic apartments, art galleries, breweries, and food halls.

Avg. Rent: $1,900 Walk Score: 83
Explore RiNo
View All Neighborhoods
